examples.example: 我这个月努力工作，拿到了丰厚的工资，真是太开心了。

translate.english: I worked hard this month and got a generous salary. I'm really so happy.

examples.example: 我的工资虽然不算很多，但足够我过上快乐的生活。

translate.english: Although my salary is not very much, it is enough for me to live a happy life.

examples.example: 我凭借自己的努力获得了理想的工资，这让我对未来充满了信心。

translate.english: I obtained the ideal salary through my own efforts, which made me full of confidence in the future.
